models.train_classifier module¶

models.train_classifier.build_model()[source]¶

Build the ML model.

Returns:sklearn multioutput classifer model.
Return type:model
models.train_classifier.evaluate_model(model, X_test, Y_test, category_names)[source]¶

Function to evaluate model predictions on the test set and print classification metrics.

Parameters:
  • model (sklearn model) – sklearn classification model trained on the training set.
  • X_test (np.array) – Test set features.
  • Y_test (np.array) – Test set targets.
  • category_names (list) – List of category names for each target.
Returns:
Return type:

None

Load data from the database.

Parameters:database_filepath (str) – Database filepath.
Returns:Tuple of features, targets and target names.
Return type:tuple

Auxiliary function to round elements of a list to n decimal places.

  • n (int) – Number of decmial places to round the elements of list.
Returns:

List with elements rounded to n decimal places.
